# Script API References

Landing page containing documentation of experimental and stable Script APIs for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition.

## Documentation

For more detailed documentation, the changelog, and How-To Guide provided by Microsoft, see https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/scriptapi/.


## Versions

- <a href="1.19.80/index" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">Script API - v1.19.80</a>
## Installation

Script API runs on Minecraft, but TypeScript type definitions for API modules are available as a NPM package.
- [1.19.80-stable](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@script-api/1.19.80)
